languages.text: {n}Удар сбивает Хейнрикса с концентрации. Псайкер успевает бросить на вас изумленный взгляд прежде чем бритвенно острый клинок рассекает его лицо, разваливает череп пополам и сносит остатки головы. Обезглавленное тело мешком валится под ноги Маражая.{/n}

{n}The blow catches Heinrix off guard, and he gives you a stunned look before a razor-sharp blade slices through his face, cleaving his skull in two and severing the rest of his head. His decapitated body falls heavily at Marazhai's feet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Удар сбивает Хейнрикса с концентрации. Псайкер успевает бросить на вас изумленный взгляд прежде чем бритвенно острый клинок рассекает его лицо, разваливает череп пополам и сносит остатки головы. Обезглавленное тело мешком валится под ноги Маражая.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The blow catches Heinrix off guard, and he gives you a stunned look before a razor-sharp blade slices through his face, cleaving his skull in two and severing the rest of his head. His decapitated body falls heavily at Marazhai's feet.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The blow catches Heinrix off guard, and he gives you a stunned look before a razor-sharp blade slices through his face, cleaving his skull in two and severing the rest of his head. His decapitated body falls heavily at Marazhai's feet.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}油断しているところに一撃を入れられ、ハインリックスがあ然とした顔であなたを見つめる。それから切れ味鋭い刃がその顔を切り裂き、頭蓋はふたつに切断され、残った頭部を分ける。切り落とされた胴体はずしりとマラズハイの足下に倒れる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blow catches Heinrix off guard, and he gives you a stunned look before a razor-sharp blade slices through his face, cleaving his skull in two and severing the rest of his head. His decapitated body falls heavily at Marazhai's feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}油断しているところに一撃を入れられ、ハインリックスがあ然とした顔であなたを見つめる。それから切れ味鋭い刃がその顔を切り裂き、頭蓋はふたつに切断され、残った頭部を分ける。切り落とされた胴体はずしりとマラズハイの足下に倒れる。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}你突然发难，打了海因里希一个措手不及。他一脸错愕地看着你，随后锋利的刀刃将他的颅骨一劈两半，切下了他的半个脑袋。他残损的尸体轰然倒在玛拉斋脚旁。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blow catches Heinrix off guard, and he gives you a stunned look before a razor-sharp blade slices through his face, cleaving his skull in two and severing the rest of his head. His decapitated body falls heavily at Marazhai's feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你突然发难，打了海因里希一个措手不及。他一脸错愕地看着你，随后锋利的刀刃将他的颅骨一劈两半，切下了他的半个脑袋。他残损的尸体轰然倒在玛拉斋脚旁。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le coup prend Heinrix par surprise et il vous lance un regard stupéfait avant qu'une lame aussi tranchante qu'un rasoir ne lui fende le crâne en deux et ne lui tranche la tête. Son cadavre décapité s'effondre lourdement au pied de Marazhai.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blow catches Heinrix off guard, and he gives you a stunned look before a razor-sharp blade slices through his face, cleaving his skull in two and severing the rest of his head. His decapitated body falls heavily at Marazhai's feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le coup prend Heinrix par surprise et il vous lance un regard stupéfait avant qu'une lame aussi tranchante qu'un rasoir ne lui fende le crâne en deux et ne lui tranche la tête. Son cadavre décapité s'effondre lourdement au pied de Marazhai.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}El impacto pilla desprevenido a Heinrix, que te mira atónito antes de que una hoja afilada le atraviese la cara, partiéndole el cráneo en dos y seccionándole el resto de la cabeza. Su cuerpo decapitado cae abruptamente a los pies de Marazhai.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blow catches Heinrix off guard, and he gives you a stunned look before a razor-sharp blade slices through his face, cleaving his skull in two and severing the rest of his head. His decapitated body falls heavily at Marazhai's feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El impacto pilla desprevenido a Heinrix, que te mira atónito antes de que una hoja afilada le atraviese la cara, partiéndole el cráneo en dos y seccionándole el resto de la cabeza. Su cuerpo decapitado cae abruptamente a los pies de Marazhai.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Hieb trifft Heinrix unerwartet. Er wirft dir noch einen ungläubigen Blick zu, ehe die rasiermesserscharfe Klinge seinen Schädel in zwei Hälften spaltet und vom Rumpf abtrennt. Sein enthaupteter Körper sinkt vor Marazhais Füßen zu Boden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blow catches Heinrix off guard, and he gives you a stunned look before a razor-sharp blade slices through his face, cleaving his skull in two and severing the rest of his head. His decapitated body falls heavily at Marazhai's feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Hieb trifft Heinrix unerwartet. Er wirft dir noch einen ungläubigen Blick zu, ehe die rasiermesserscharfe Klinge seinen Schädel in zwei Hälften spaltet und vom Rumpf abtrennt. Sein enthaupteter Körper sinkt vor Marazhais Füßen zu Boden.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Darbeye hazırlıksız yakalanan Heinrix, sana şaşkın bir bakış atıyor. Ardından jilet keskinliğindeki kılıç; Heinrix'in yüzünü kesip geçiyor, kafatasını ortadan ikiye ayırıp kellesini koparıyor. Heinrix'in başsız vücudu, Marazhai'ın ayaklarının dibinde yere yıkılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blow catches Heinrix off guard, and he gives you a stunned look before a razor-sharp blade slices through his face, cleaving his skull in two and severing the rest of his head. His decapitated body falls heavily at Marazhai's feet.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix darbeye hazırlıksız yakalanıyor ve sana şaşkın bir bakış atıyor. Ardından, jilet keskinliğindeki kılıç Heinrix'in yüzünü kesip geçiyor, kafatasını ortadan ikiye ayırıp kellesini koparıyor. Heinrix'in başsız vücudu, Marazhai'ın ayaklarının dibinde yere yıkılıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
